TestDescription.name: Apache version older than 1.3.39

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description:
[coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break][bold]Security fixes in Apache version 1.3.39:[/bold][break][ul] [li]CVE-2006-5752 (cve.mitre.org) mod_status: Fix a possible XSS attack against a site with a public server-status page and ExtendedStatus enabled, for browsers which perform charset "detection". Reported by Stefan Esser. [Joe Orton][/li]
[li]CVE-2007-3304 (cve.mitre.org) Ensure that the parent process cannot be forced to kill non-child processes by checking scoreboard PID data with parent process privately stored PID data. [Jim Jagielski][/li]
[/ul][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 1.3.38).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Check references for details about each vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache to the latest version.
